definition: nest/pit or hollow on the human body/lair/den/place/to harbor or shelter/to hold in check/to bend/classifier for litters and broods

sentences.english: I afforded your trip but you rendered my son so much trouble.
sentences.chinese: 我出钱，还让我儿子受了这么多的窝囊气。

sentences.english: He searched for a lover for his wife after he became paralyzed, is he a wretch or a true man?
sentences.chinese: 瘫痪后，他为他的妻子找情人，是窝囊废还是纯爷们？

sentences.english: After all, we're a  cowardly nation. We've long had a cowardly government.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟，我们是个窝囊的国家，一直就有个窝囊政府。

sentences.english: After all, we're a  cowardly nation. We've long had a cowardly government.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟，我们是个窝囊的国家，一直就有个窝囊政府。

sentences.english: "I'm goin' to quit, " he announced. "I won't stand for it.
sentences.chinese: “我不干了，”他宣布，“受不了这种窝囊气。

sentences.english: No money, the somebody else scold you are wimps.
sentences.chinese: 没有钱，人家骂你是窝囊废。

sentences.english: Can you believe it? That pathetic loser stoled my story.
sentences.chinese: 你能想象吗？那个可悲的窝囊废偷用了我的故事。

sentences.english: He is really a worthless wretch.
Lino is the head of a dangerous family. There isn't room for wimps in this family.
sentences.chinese: 李诺是黑帮家族首脑，这家庭里容不下窝囊废。

sentences.english: By contrast those seen as wimpiersorts will have longer index fingers.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，那些被认为较窝囊的男人食指则更长。

sentences.english: Mike was the good-for-nothing son in Smith and Son Construction.
sentences.chinese: 迈克是史密斯与儿子建筑公司里阿谁窝囊废儿子。

sentences.english: She has more pride than the wimpless guy.
sentences.chinese: 她比那窝囊家伙更得意。

sentences.english: A flimflam man, matchstick man, loser.
sentences.chinese: 花言巧语的家伙，火柴人，窝囊废。
那就证明我是个窝囊废。

sentences.english: A shame to let a joker like this win.
sentences.chinese: 让这么一个窝囊废赢了真丢丑。

sentences.english: The man is absolutely a loser.
sentences.chinese: 这个男孩是个彻头彻尾的窝囊废。

definition: to look down upon/to hold in contempt
